function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Lack of access to urban green spaces leading to overcrowding in existing spaces","Impact":"Increased risk of disease transmission due to overcrowding in urban green spaces","Mitigation":"Expand and diversify urban green spaces to distribute visitors and reduce overcrowding","Technologies":"Urban planning software for space allocation and design, landscaping techniques for diverse greenery","People":"City residents, visitors to urban green spaces","Owner":"Urban planners, city government"},{"Description":"Inadequate shading and ventilation in urban green spaces","Impact":"Risk of heat-related illnesses and discomfort for visitors to urban green spaces","Mitigation":"Planting and maintaining healthy trees to provide shade and promote air circulation, installation of outdoor cooling systems","Technologies":"Tree planting and monitoring technology, outdoor ventilation and cooling systems","People":"City residents, visitors to urban green spaces","Owner":"Urban planners, city government"},{"Description":"Lack of coordination in urban policy and planning to address new behaviors and needs arising from the COVID-19 pandemic","Impact":"Inability to respond effectively to the changing urban landscape and resident needs, leading to potential hygiene and safety challenges","Mitigation":"Integration of public health considerations into urban planning, adoption of flexible and adaptable design strategies","Technologies":"Urban data analytics for monitoring and predicting urban behavior, adaptive urban design software","People":"City residents, urban planners, public health officials","Owner":"City government, public health departments"}]}
